attributes.action: Stop Governmental Lip Service to Petitions. We demand they are taken seriously.
attributes.background: It is becoming apparent that the government dismiss petitions with which they don't agree. Regardless of the number of signatures or the relevancy of the subject. Either this is a legitimate way for the British people to air their views, or it is a pointless exercise. British voters are not stupid.

rejection.details: It's not clear what action you would the Government to take in response to petitions. If you want a specific action, you could start a petition calling for that.
